mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.user_no, b.name as userName, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.g_no as gNo, a.o_no as oNo, a.depth as depth from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by a.g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO board (title, contents, hit, reg_date, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no) SELECT #{title}, #{contents}, 0, NOW(), IFNULL(MAX(g_no), 0) + 1, 1, 0, #{userNo} FROM board
select last_insert_id() from dual
